Wednesday, March 9, 2005

Codepaste.org will rise from the ashes

Posted by admin

Bruce Williams is promising the return of codepaste.org, which used to be the preferred paste site in #rubyonrails before it went away. For a long time. But now it’s coming back and Bruce is even promising to package it up in a GEM shortly, so it can be installed locally. Yay!
